name: Aggregator Interface
description: This specification defines standard functions for the contract that uses the aggregator interface.

eventDecorators.name: Answer updated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the answer is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: Current answer
parameterDecorators.description: The latest answer from the OCR contract.

parameterDecorators.name: Update timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Timestamp when the answer was updated.

eventDecorators.name: New round
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the new round has been initiated.

parameterDecorators.name: Oracle address
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the oracle that initiated the round.

parameterDecorators.name: Start timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: Timestamp when the new round started.

functionDecorators.name: Get latest answer
functionDecorators.description: Returns the latest answer from the oracle.

returnDecorators.name: Latest Answer
returnDecorators.description: The latest answer from the OCR contract

functionDecorators.name: Get latest timestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the latest timestamp of the price feed update.

returnDecorators.name: Latest Timestamp
returnDecorators.description: The latest timestamp of the last update of the price feed.

functionDecorators.name: Get latest round
functionDecorators.description: Returns the latest round from the oracle.

returnDecorators.name: Latest Round
returnDecorators.description: The latest round ID of the last update of the price feed.

functionDecorators.name: Get answer
functionDecorators.description: Returns the answer for the given round ID.

returnDecorators.name: Answer
returnDecorators.description: The latest answer provided by the oracle, that is used to calculate the price of an asset.

functionDecorators.name: Get timestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the timestamp for the given round.

returnDecorators.name: Timestamp
returnDecorators.description: The timestamp of the last update of the price feed.
